summary: Tested 'Wow' features: Dark Mode toggle, AI Chat Assistant, SEO Audit async flow, Competition analysis async flow. All 12 backend tests passed. Frontend features verified with Playwright - Dark mode toggles correctly and persists on reload. AI Chat panel in ArticleEditor works with send/clear buttons. SEO Audit shows async polling with 'Skanowanie...' loading state.

issues: Console warning: '<tr> cannot be a child of <span>' - React hydration issue in article list table, not blocking

passed_tests: ✓ POST /api/chat/message returns AI response when authenticated
✓ POST /api/seo-audit returns job_id with status 'queued' immediately
✓ Frontend: Dark mode toggle visible in sidebar (data-testid='dark-mode-toggle')
✓ Frontend: Dark mode toggle switches theme between light/dark
✓ Frontend: Theme persists after page reload
✓ Frontend: Chat tab visible in ArticleEditor (data-testid='article-chat-tab')
✓ Frontend: AI Chat panel visible with input and send button
✓ Frontend: SEO Audit page loads with URL input and 'Audytuj' button
✓ Frontend: SEO Audit shows 'Skanowanie...' loading state during async polling
✓ Frontend: SEO Audit history shows previous audits
critical_code_review_comments: Dashboard.js has minor React hydration warning about <tr>/<span> nesting - cosmetic issue only, doesn't affect functionality
seed_data_creation: SEO audits for https://example.com created during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Wow features fully verified: 1) Dark Mode toggle in sidebar switches between light/dark themes using data-theme attribute on documentElement, persists in localStorage 2) AI Chat Assistant panel in ArticleEditor accessible via Chat tab, sends messages to /api/chat/message with auth token 3) SEO Audit async flow works - POST returns job_id immediately, frontend polls status until completed 4) Competition Analysis async flow works same pattern. TPay API is MOCKED.

seo_audit_async.pattern: Returns job_id immediately, poll for completion

competition_async.pattern: Returns job_id immediately, poll for completion
